Eudaimonia Machine

Tags
Future of Work
What's an ideal workplace? Something like the Eudaimonia Machine, mentioned in the book 'Deep Work'. It has the following spaces:
 
1/ Gallery for showcasing everyones' work
2/ Salon for couches and coffee - for discussion and collaboration
3/ Library for resources like books
4/ Office space for shallow work
5/ Deep work chamber for uninterrupted work flow
 

Few common features between digital and physical:

1/ Gallery – showcase your great work + see and react to others
2/ Salon – chat and collaborate
3/ Library – personalized and curated learning at your fingertips
4/ Shallow work - listen to a podcast while doing routine activities
5/ Deep work - do not disturb based on type of work being done - for e.g. coding, designing, writing, creating
